0.1.name: wordpress/wpmu-marketpress-allow-comments-addon
0.1.description:
A simple addon that will allow comments to be added to product listing. When the addon is ON, you can select on which elements to add/remove comments. BUT you will have to manually set comments to created listings!!!

But first thing you will need the MarketPress plugin from WPMU.

Enjoy using WPMU MarketPress Allow Comments Plugin? Please consider making a small donation to support the software’s continued development.
